#nigeriaelections2023 I think that if a Presidential Candidate who embraces BTC emerges and states the adoption of Bitcoin in Nigeria in his campaign, he'd be largely voted for by the Nigerian Bitcoin community and youths in general and probably win the elections...
Do lots of Nigerians use Bitcoin?

A lot of us do use Bitcoin. So many Nigerians use Bitcoin. Although it is banned, we have a way of transacting. We don't indicate anything crypto in our bank transactions else our bank accounts get flagged. So we give other narrations when we trade crypto with fiat.
